## Color3.scaleAndAddToRef() method

Scale the current Color3 values by a factor and add the result to a given Color3

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleAndAddToRef(scale: number, result: Color3): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |
|  result | <code>Color3</code> | defines color to store the result into |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

the unmodified current Color3
